title.narrative: Strengthening coordination of EU integration processes in Federation BIH
Strengthening coordination of EU integration processes in Federation BIH

description.narrative: Goal is defined as follows: Improved capacity of the Government of the Federation of BiH in regard of its capability to implement and monitor the Stabilizationa and Association Agreement. Developed and established procedures and rules for horizontal coordination of the Federal administration bodies. Coordinated preparation of the strategic documents in BiH regarding EU integration process. Strengthened human and technical (IT) capacities of the Office for EU integration within the Fedeation BiH Government. Fulfilled of the conditions that relate to the BiH-EU Stabilization and Association Agreement

Projektets mål är att ge stöd till BiH Federala regering för att öka kapacitet inom EU integrering genom att tillhandahålla med 3 konsulter under perioden på två år samt till begränsad kontorsutrustning.
Federationen BiH står inför stora utmaningar i samordning med federala ministerier och andra organ inom verksamhet, implementering och rapporteringskrave enligt EU: s stabiliserings- och associeringsavtal samt inom samordning av EU-frågeformuläret.
Det tillfälliga stödet begärs av den nuvarande premiärministerns kabinett direkt till Sveriges ambassad i BH.

The objective of the Project is to provide support to the Federation BH Government to increase the capacity of its Office for EU integrations, by providing up to 3 Consultants/ trainers for a period of two years and limited office Equipment. The Government of the Federation BH entity is facing significant challenges in coordinating with federal ministries and other bodies, in activities, supervision and reporting requirements under EU stabiliation and association agreement and additionally with coordination of the EU questionnaire. The temporary support is requested by the current Prime Minister cabinet directly to the Ambassador of Sweden.

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management

tag.narrative: 17.14 - Enhance policy coherence for sustainable development.
17.14 - Föra en mer samstämmig politik för hållbar utveckling.

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: Strategic objective 1Ensuring the human and material capacities necessary to strengthen the capacity for monitoring and coordination of the EU integration processes in the Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina, and the optimal functioning of the Project. Main resultConsultants were hired, initially 6 young qualified women. As one consultant found a better job, she was replaced with one young man. All consultants, with the exception of two interpreters, were entry level staff for government service. Strategic objective 2.Improving the capacity of the Office in terms of monitoring, reporting and planning in the context of fulfilling the obligations within the competence of the FBiH Government, the FBiH ministries and other bodies of the FBiH administration arising from theStabilization and Association Agreement. Main result: During the Project period, the consultants were tasked with monitoring and updating the list of coordinators of the FBiH ministries and other FBiH administrative bodies, and monitoring the appointment of representatives to working groups. The consultants continuously participated in the horizontal coordination between the FBiH administrative bodies and vertical coordination with the Directorate for European Integration of the Council of Ministers of BiH. Strategic objective 3.Coordination of the EU Assistance and the EU Programmes (including subobjectives, which are in line with the Decree on the Office of the Government of the FBiH for European Integration) Main result: The consultants have been regularly informing the competent FBiH institutions about Public Invitations for applications/project proposals for assistance under. In addition, the consultants, in accordance with the reports received, have been regularly submitting a bimonthly report on the implementation of all IPA projects to the competent FBiH institutions. Strategic objective 4.Increasing the individual professional capacity of the staff in the Office for European integration and ensuring the Project visibility Main result: Within this objective, a study visit to the institutions in Vienna (the Republic of Austria) was organised from 2 to 6 December 2019. On that occasion, three consultants of the Project Implementation Unit, Director of the Office and two civil servants visited the following institutions: Offices of the Federal Chancellor, Ministry of Labour, Social Affairs, Health and Consumer Protection of theRepublic of Austria, European Social Fund and the Liaison Office of the Austrian Federal Provinces within the Office of the Lower Austrian Government. During the study visit, the consultants were informed on the experience of these institutions regarding the European integration process, with a view to better understand andimprove the knowledge of the coordination of European integration process at the level of the federal government. Within the above objective, “Handbook for general knowledge and professional exam in the field of European integration” was developed.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
